about_the_game:
About This Game


Welcome to Hentai Match Fantasy Stories, a match-3 game that redefines the classic genre with a twist! Imagine immersing yourself in a traditional match-3 experience, where your skill and strategy guide you through levels of increasing complexity. Now, add a layer of challenge that tests not just your puzzle-solving abilities but your focus and adaptability. Match Fantasy Stories introduces unexpected video distractions during gameplay, pushing the boundaries of your concentration and dexterity.

What's New in This VersionDriven by Community Feedback: As a developer, I've grown alongside Hentai Match Fantasy Stories. Learning from past experiences, I'm now more committed than ever to listening to our players. Your feedback is the compass that guides the enhancements and new features in our game.

Stunning 3D Model Videos: Prepare to be dazzled! The latest update introduces 3D model videos that seamlessly integrate into the gameplay, adding depth and immersion like never before.

Revamped Audio Experience: Dive into a world where every match and move resonates with meticulously redesigned music and sound effects, elevating your gaming experience.

Streamlined Interface: We've made significant improvements to the user interface, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the game's visual splendor. Enjoy the option to hide the GUI and indulge in the enhanced CGI, now more captivating than ever.

Gameplay Enhancements: While we've removed the storyline to focus on the core match-3 gameplay and the unique video distraction feature, we're continuously working on balancing and refining the game mechanics to ensure the most enjoyable experience for players of all skill levels.

Future Updates and Commitment
We acknowledge that Match Fantasy Stories still has room for growth, with ongoing balancing tweaks and bug fixes on the horizon. Your continued support and feedback are invaluable as we strive to perfect this unique gaming experience. Join us on this journey, and let's create match-3 magic together!

Features at a Glance
Classic match-3 gameplay with a unique twist: video distractions!
New 3D model videos added to challenge and entertain.(Placeholders by now)
Completely overhauled music and sound effects for an immersive experience.
Option to remove the GUI for a pure visual delight with enhanced CGI.
Ongoing improvements based on player feedback, including game balance and bug fixes.
Thank you for considering Match Fantasy Stories. Your adventure and challenges await. Are you ready to match, be mesmerized, and master the unexpected?

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: Nudity or sexual content, Non-specific adult content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Dive into a match-3 with a twist! Navigate classic gameplay with unexpected 3D video distractions, revamped sounds, and a sleek interface. Your focus has never been tested like this. Join us, and master the challenge!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
